mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.REC_CZSJ DESC) AS RNO, (CASE WHEN B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} THEN 'CURRENT' ELSE 'LAST' END) DATA_VERSION, B.ID AS ID, B.DPRTCODE AS DPRTCODE, B.PGDH AS PGDH, B.BB AS BB, (CASE WHEN B.LYLX = 1 THEN '适航性资料' WHEN B.LYLX = 9 THEN '其他' END) LYLX, B.LYSM AS LYSM, JSWJ.JSWJBH||' '||JSWJ.BB AS JSWJID, GLPGD.PGDH||' '||GLPGD.BB GLPGDID, B.JX AS JX, TO_CHAR(B.PGQX, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PGQX, B.ZJH ||' '||ZJ.YWMS AS ZJH, B.PGDZT AS PGDZT, B.SXYQ AS SXYQ, TO_CHAR(B.YJBFZLSJ, 'yyyy-mm-dd') YJBFZLSJ, B.BZ AS BZ, (CASE WHEN B.ZXBS = 1 THEN '初始' WHEN B.ZXBS = 2 THEN '最新版本' WHEN B.ZXBS = 3 THEN '老版本' END) ZXBS, (CASE WHEN (OLDPGD.PGDH IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE OLDPGD.PGDH||' R'||OLDPGD.BB END )F_BBID, (CASE WHEN ( NEWPGD.PGDH IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE NEWPGD.PGDH||' R'||NEWPGD.BB END )B_BBID, (CASE WHEN B.ZT = -1 THEN '初始状态' WHEN B.ZT = 1 THEN '保存' WHEN B.ZT = 2 THEN '已评估' WHEN B.ZT = 3 THEN '已审核' WHEN B.ZT = 4 THEN '已批准' WHEN B.ZT = 5 THEN '审核驳回' WHEN B.ZT = 6 THEN '批准驳回' WHEN B.ZT = 9 THEN '指定结束' WHEN B.ZT = 10 THEN '完成' END) ZT , PGBB.DPRTNAME AS PGBMID, PG.USERNAME ||' '|| PG.REALNAME AS PGRID, TO_CHAR(B.PGSJ, 'yyyy-mm-dd') PGSJ, SHBB.DPRTNAME AS SHBMID, SH.USERNAME ||' '|| SH.REALNAME AS SHRID, TO_CHAR(B.SHSJ, 'yyyy-mm-dd') SHSJ, B.SHYJ AS SHYJ, (CASE WHEN B.SHJL = 3 THEN '已审核' WHEN B.SHJL = 5 THEN '审核驳回' END) SHJL, PZBB.DPRTNAME AS PFBMID, PZ.USERNAME ||' '|| PZ.REALNAME AS PFRID, TO_CHAR(B.PFSJ, 'yyyy-mm-dd') PFSJ, B.PFYJ AS PFYJ, (CASE WHEN B.PFJL = 3 THEN '已批准' WHEN B.PFJL = 5 THEN '批准驳回' END) PFJL, GB.USERNAME ||' '|| GB.REALNAME AS GBRID, TO_CHAR(B.GBRQ, 'yyyy-mm-dd') GBRQ, B.GBYY AS GBYY, B.REC_CZSM AS REC_CZSM,
B.REC_CZLS AS REC_CZLS, B.REC_XGLX AS REC_XGLX,
RECWHR.USERNAME||' '||RECWHR.REALNAME AS REC_CZR_NAME, (CASE WHEN (B.PGDH IS NULL) THEN '机型 : '||B.JX ELSE B.PGDH||' R'||B.BB END )REC_HD, B.REC_CZSJ AS REC_CZSJ, B.REC_IP AS REC_IP
FROM B_G2_001_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER RECWHR ON RECWHR.ID = B.REC_CZRID LEFT JOIN D_005 ZJ ON (B.ZJH=ZJ.ZJH AND B.DPRTCODE = ZJ.DPRTCODE) LEFT JOIN B_G2_000 JSWJ ON B.JSWJID=JSWJ.ID LEFT JOIN B_G2_001 GLPGD ON B.GLPGDID=GLPGD.ID LEFT JOIN B_G2_001 OLDPGD ON B.f_bbid=OLDPGD.ID LEFT JOIN B_G2_001 NEWPGD ON B.b_bbid=NEWPGD.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER PG ON B.PGRID = PG.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER SH ON B.SHRID = SH.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER PZ ON B.PFRID = PZ.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER GB ON B.gbrid = GB.ID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT PGBB ON B.PGBMID= PGBB.ID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT SHBB ON B.SHBMID= SHBB.ID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT PZBB ON B.PFBMID= PZBB.ID
WHERE
B.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ( SELECT REC_CZSJ FROM B_G2_001_REC WHERE REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType = VARCHAR} AND ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) >= B.REC_CZSJ
) A WHERE 2 >=RNO

SELECT B.*, 'CURRENT' DATA_VERSION, (CASE WHEN B.SYX = 0 THEN '不适用' WHEN B.SYX = 1 THEN '适用' END) AS FSYX, (CASE WHEN B.SYLB = 1 THEN '飞机' WHEN B.SYLB = 2 THEN '发动机' WHEN B.SYLB = 3 THEN 'APU' WHEN B.SYLB = 99 THEN '其他部件' END) AS FSYLB, (CASE WHEN B.IS_CFJC = 0 THEN '是' WHEN B.IS_CFJC = 1 THEN '否' END) AS FIS_CFJC, (CASE WHEN B.IS_ZZCS = 0 THEN '是' WHEN B.IS_ZZCS = 1 THEN '否' END) AS FIS_ZZCS, (CASE WHEN B.IS_MFHC = 0 THEN '是' WHEN B.IS_MFHC = 1 THEN '否' END) AS FIS_MFHC, (CASE WHEN B.IS_ZBHC = 0 THEN '是' WHEN B.IS_ZBHC = 1 THEN '否' END) AS FIS_ZBHC, (CASE WHEN B.IS_TSGJ = 0 THEN '是' WHEN B.IS_TSGJ = 1 THEN '否' END) AS FIS_TSGJ, (CASE WHEN B.IS_YXZLPH = 0 THEN '是' WHEN B.IS_YXZLPH = 1 THEN '否' END) AS FIS_YXZLPH, B13.WBWJM ||'.'||B13.HZM AS FJLFJID,
B.REC_CZSM AS REC_CZSM,
B.REC_CZLS AS REC_CZLS, B.REC_XGLX AS REC_XGLX,
RECWHR.USERNAME||' '||RECWHR.REALNAME AS REC_CZR_NAME, B.REC_CZSJ AS REC_CZSJ, B.REC_IP AS REC_IP
FROM B_G2_00100_REC B
LEFT JOIN T_USER RECWHR ON RECWHR.ID = B.REC_CZRID LEFT JOIN D_011 B13 ON B.JLFJID=B13.MAINID AND B13.YXZT=1
WHERE B.REC_ZBID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UNION ALL
SELECT B.*, 'LAST' DATA_VERSION ,
(CASE WHEN B.SYX = 0 THEN '不适用' WHEN B.SYX = 1 THEN '适用' END) AS FSYX, (CASE WHEN B.SYLB = 1 THEN '飞机' WHEN B.SYLB = 2 THEN '发动机' WHEN B.SYLB = 3 THEN 'APU' WHEN B.SYLB = 99 THEN '其他部件' END) AS FSYLB, (CASE WHEN B.IS_CFJC = 0 THEN '是' WHEN B.IS_CFJC = 1 THEN '否' END) AS FIS_CFJC, (CASE WHEN B.IS_ZZCS = 0 THEN '是' WHEN B.IS_ZZCS = 1 THEN '否' END) AS FIS_ZZCS, (CASE WHEN B.IS_MFHC = 0 THEN '是' WHEN B.IS_MFHC = 1 THEN '否' END) AS FIS_MFHC, (CASE WHEN B.IS_ZBHC = 0 THEN '是' WHEN B.IS_ZBHC = 1 THEN '否' END) AS FIS_ZBHC, (CASE WHEN B.IS_TSGJ = 0 THEN '是' WHEN B.IS_TSGJ = 1 THEN '否' END) AS FIS_TSGJ, (CASE WHEN B.IS_YXZLPH = 0 THEN '是' WHEN B.IS_YXZLPH = 1 THEN '否' END) AS FIS_YXZLPH, B13.WBWJM || B13.HZM AS FJLFJID,
B.REC_CZSM AS REC_CZSM,
B.REC_CZLS AS REC_CZLS, B.REC_XGLX AS REC_XGLX,
RECWHR.USERNAME||' '||RECWHR.REALNAME AS REC_CZR_NAME, B.REC_CZSJ AS REC_CZSJ, B.REC_IP AS REC_IP
FROM B_G2_00100_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER RECWHR ON RECWHR.ID = B.REC_CZRID LEFT JOIN D_011 B13 ON B.JLFJID=B13.MAINID AND B13.YXZT=1 WHERE B.REC_ZBID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.REC_CZLS IN ( SELECT REC_CZLS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO , REC_CZLS FROM B_G2_001_REC A WHERE A.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REC_CZSJ <= ( SELECT C.REC_CZSJ FROM B_G2_001_REC C WHERE C.ID= #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND C.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND A.REC_CZLS != #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHERE 1 = RNO )

SELECT B.*, 'CURRENT' DATA_VERSION, TO_CHAR(B.BFRQ, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FBFRQ, TO_CHAR(B.SXRQ, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FSXRQ, TO_CHAR(B.DQRQ, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FDQRQ, (CASE WHEN B.ZT = 0 THEN '失效' WHEN B.ZT = 1 THEN '有效' END) AS FZT, WHR.USERNAME ||' '|| WHR.REALNAME AS FWHRID, WHBB.DPRTNAME AS FWHDWID,
B.REC_CZSM AS REC_CZSM,
B.REC_CZLS AS REC_CZLS, B.REC_XGLX AS REC_XGLX,
RECWHR.USERNAME||' '||RECWHR.REALNAME AS REC_CZR_NAME, B.REC_CZSJ AS REC_CZSJ, B.REC_IP AS REC_IP
FROM B_G2_999_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER RECWHR ON RECWHR.ID = B.REC_CZRID LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.WHRID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT WHBB ON B.WHDWID= WHBB.ID
WHERE B.REC_ZBID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UNION ALL
SELECT B.*, 'LAST' DATA_VERSION ,
TO_CHAR(B.BFRQ, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FBFRQ, TO_CHAR(B.SXRQ, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FSXRQ, TO_CHAR(B.DQRQ, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FDQRQ, (CASE WHEN B.ZT = 0 THEN '失效' WHEN B.ZT = 1 THEN '有效' END) AS FZT, WHR.USERNAME ||' '|| WHR.REALNAME AS FWHRID, WHBB.DPRTNAME AS FWHDWID,
B.REC_CZSM AS REC_CZSM,
B.REC_CZLS AS REC_CZLS, B.REC_XGLX AS REC_XGLX,
RECWHR.USERNAME||' '||RECWHR.REALNAME AS REC_CZR_NAME, B.REC_CZSJ AS REC_CZSJ, B.REC_IP AS REC_IP
FROM B_G2_999_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER RECWHR ON RECWHR.ID = B.REC_CZRID LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.WHRID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT WHBB ON B.WHDWID= WHBB.ID
WHERE B.REC_ZBID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.REC_CZLS IN ( SELECT REC_CZLS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO , REC_CZLS FROM B_G2_001_REC A WHERE A.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REC_CZSJ <= ( SELECT C.REC_CZSJ FROM B_G2_001_REC C WHERE C.ID= #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND C.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND A.REC_CZLS != #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHERE 1 = RNO )

SELECT B.*, 'CURRENT' DATA_VERSION, (CASE WHEN B.ZT = 0 THEN '失效' WHEN B.ZT = 1 THEN '有效' END) AS FZT, WHR.USERNAME ||' '|| WHR.REALNAME AS FWHRID, WHBB.DPRTNAME AS FWHDWID, (CASE WHEN B.ZLXL = 1 THEN '维护提示' WHEN B.ZLXL = 2 THEN '技术指令' WHEN B.ZLXL = 3 THEN '修订维修方案' WHEN B.ZLXL = 4 THEN '下达NRC' WHEN B.ZLXL = 6 THEN '工程指令EO' WHEN B.ZLXL = 7 THEN 'MEL更改' WHEN B.ZLXL = 8 THEN '修订工卡' WHEN B.ZLXL = 99 THEN '其他' END) AS FZLXL, ZDR.USERNAME ||' '|| ZDR.REALNAME AS FZDRYID,
B.REC_CZSM AS REC_CZSM,
B.REC_CZLS AS REC_CZLS, B.REC_XGLX AS REC_XGLX,
RECWHR.USERNAME||' '||RECWHR.REALNAME AS REC_CZR_NAME, B.REC_CZSJ AS REC_CZSJ, B.REC_IP AS REC_IP
FROM B_G2_00101_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER RECWHR ON RECWHR.ID = B.REC_CZRID LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.WHRID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT WHBB ON B.WHDWID= WHBB.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER ZDR ON ZDR.ID = B.ZDRYID
WHERE B.REC_ZBID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UNION ALL
SELECT B.*, 'LAST' DATA_VERSION ,
(CASE WHEN B.ZT = 0 THEN '失效' WHEN B.ZT = 1 THEN '有效' END) AS FZT, WHR.USERNAME ||' '|| WHR.REALNAME AS FWHRID, WHBB.DPRTNAME AS FWHDWID, (CASE WHEN B.ZLXL = 1 THEN '维护提示' WHEN B.ZLXL = 2 THEN '技术指令' WHEN B.ZLXL = 3 THEN '修订维修方案' WHEN B.ZLXL = 4 THEN '下达NRC' WHEN B.ZLXL = 6 THEN '工程指令EO' WHEN B.ZLXL = 7 THEN 'MEL更改' WHEN B.ZLXL = 8 THEN '修订工卡' WHEN B.ZLXL = 99 THEN '其他' END) AS FZLXL, ZDR.USERNAME ||' '|| ZDR.REALNAME AS FZDRYID,
B.REC_CZSM AS REC_CZSM,
B.REC_CZLS AS REC_CZLS, B.REC_XGLX AS REC_XGLX,
RECWHR.USERNAME||' '||RECWHR.REALNAME AS REC_CZR_NAME, B.REC_CZSJ AS REC_CZSJ, B.REC_IP AS REC_IP
FROM B_G2_00101_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER RECWHR ON RECWHR.ID = B.REC_CZRID LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.WHRID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT WHBB ON B.WHDWID= WHBB.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER ZDR ON ZDR.ID = B.ZDRYID
WHERE B.REC_ZBID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.REC_CZLS IN ( SELECT REC_CZLS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO , REC_CZLS FROM B_G2_001_REC A WHERE A.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REC_CZSJ <= ( SELECT C.REC_CZSJ FROM B_G2_001_REC C WHERE C.ID= #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND C.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND A.REC_CZLS != #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHERE 1 = RNO )

SELECT B.*, 'CURRENT' DATA_VERSION, (CASE WHEN B.ZT = 0 THEN '失效' WHEN B.ZT = 1 THEN '有效' END) AS FZT, (CASE WHEN B.IS_JS = 0 THEN '否' WHEN B.IS_JS = 1 THEN '是' END) AS FIS_JS, WHR.USERNAME ||' '|| WHR.REALNAME AS FWHRID, WHBB.DPRTNAME AS FWHDWID, '技术评估单' AS FYWLX, BM.DPRTNAME AS FDXID,
B.REC_CZSM AS REC_CZSM,
B.REC_CZLS AS REC_CZLS, B.REC_XGLX AS REC_XGLX,
RECWHR.USERNAME||' '||RECWHR.REALNAME AS REC_CZR_NAME, B.REC_CZSJ AS REC_CZSJ, B.REC_IP AS REC_IP
FROM B_G2_998_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER RECWHR ON RECWHR.ID = B.REC_CZRID LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.WHRID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT WHBB ON B.WHDWID= WHBB.ID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT BM ON B.DXID= BM.ID
WHERE B.REC_ZBID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UNION ALL
SELECT B.*, 'LAST' DATA_VERSION ,
(CASE WHEN B.ZT = 0 THEN '失效' WHEN B.ZT = 1 THEN '有效' END) AS FZT, (CASE WHEN B.IS_JS = 0 THEN '否' WHEN B.IS_JS = 1 THEN '是' END) AS FIS_JS, WHR.USERNAME ||' '|| WHR.REALNAME AS FWHRID, WHBB.DPRTNAME AS FWHDWID, '技术评估单' AS FYWLX, BM.DPRTNAME AS FDXID,
B.REC_CZSM AS REC_CZSM,
B.REC_CZLS AS REC_CZLS, B.REC_XGLX AS REC_XGLX,
RECWHR.USERNAME||' '||RECWHR.REALNAME AS REC_CZR_NAME, B.REC_CZSJ AS REC_CZSJ, B.REC_IP AS REC_IP
FROM B_G2_998_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER RECWHR ON RECWHR.ID = B.REC_CZRID LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.WHRID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT WHBB ON B.WHDWID= WHBB.ID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT BM ON B.DXID= BM.ID
WHERE B.REC_ZBID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.REC_CZLS IN ( SELECT REC_CZLS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO , REC_CZLS FROM B_G2_001_REC A WHERE A.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REC_CZSJ <= ( SELECT C.REC_CZSJ FROM B_G2_001_REC C WHERE C.ID= #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND C.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND A.REC_CZLS != #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHERE 1 = RNO )

SELECT B.*, 'CURRENT' DATA_VERSION, B.WBWJM ||'.'||B.HZM AS FWBWJM,
B.REC_CZSM AS REC_CZSM,
B.REC_CZLS AS REC_CZLS, B.REC_XGLX AS REC_XGLX,
RECWHR.USERNAME||' '||RECWHR.REALNAME AS REC_CZR_NAME, B.REC_CZSJ AS REC_CZSJ, B.REC_IP AS REC_IP
FROM D_011_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER RECWHR ON RECWHR.ID = B.REC_CZRID
WHERE B.REC_ZBID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UNION ALL
SELECT B.*, 'LAST' DATA_VERSION , B.WBWJM ||'.'||B.HZM AS FWBWJM,
B.REC_CZSM AS REC_CZSM,
B.REC_CZLS AS REC_CZLS, B.REC_XGLX AS REC_XGLX,
RECWHR.USERNAME||' '||RECWHR.REALNAME AS REC_CZR_NAME, B.REC_CZSJ AS REC_CZSJ, B.REC_IP AS REC_IP
FROM D_011_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER RECWHR ON RECWHR.ID = B.REC_CZRID
WHERE B.REC_ZBID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.REC_CZLS IN ( SELECT REC_CZLS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO , REC_CZLS FROM B_G2_001_REC A WHERE A.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REC_CZSJ <= ( SELECT C.REC_CZSJ FROM B_G2_001_REC C WHERE C.ID= #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND C.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND A.REC_CZLS != #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHERE 1 = RNO )
